::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(openxlsx)
library(readxl)
```
:::


# read in data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
data001=read_excel('./output/all_page_bottle_list_all.xlsx')
glimpse(data001)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

Columns: 9

$ bottle_review_Mouth  <chr> "Mouth: more spices now. Mint and pepper, leading…
$ bottle_review_Finish <chr> "Finish: medium to long, more on fruit tea now, a…
$ all_page_score       <chr> "0", "0", "0", "0", "0", "0", "0", "85", "82", "8…
$ page_class           <chr> "* Cognac", "* Cognac", "* Cognac", "Ledaig", "Le…
$ page_published_date  <chr> "30 November 2020", "30 November 2020", "30 Novem…
$ page_title           <chr> "Cognac Lot 1960 / XO / Lot 1906 (Malternative Be…
$ review_url           <chr> "https://www.whiskynotes.be/2020/cognac/cognac-lo…
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
data002=data001 %>% filter(as.numeric(all_page_score)>0,as.numeric(all_page_score)<100
                       ,bottle_review_Nose !='no comment'
                      ,bottle_review_Mouth !='no comment'
                      ,bottle_review_Finish !='no comment'
                           
                           
                           ) %>% 
  mutate(review=paste(bottle_review_Nose,bottle_review_Mouth,bottle_review_Finish) %>% 
                             str_to_lower() %>% str_replace_all("[[:punct:]]", "") %>% 
                            str_replace_all('sweetness','sweet') %>% str_replace_all('apples','apple')%>% str_replace_all('oranges','orange') %>% str_replace_all('fruits','fruit')

                           )

reivew002=data002$review
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
reivew003=reivew002 %>% str_unique()
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
string <- reivew003

data002=data.frame(string) %>%
  separate_rows(string) %>%
  count(string, sort = TRUE) %>%
  filter(n >= 2)
```
:::


# remove stop word


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidytext)

data003 <- data002 %>%
  anti_join(stop_words, by= c("string" = "word"))
```
:::


# remove non favour word


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
data004 <- data003 %>% filter(!string %in% c('notes','hints'
                                            ,'nose'
                                           ,'finish'
                                            ,'light', 'slightly', 'hint', 'nice'
                                           ,'medium' , 'subtle', 'background','note' ,'plenty' ,'lots'
                                           ,'mouth','bit','soft','dark')
                                          )
```
:::


# translate to chinese


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
data005=head(data004,30)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(gtranslate)
#lang_codes

data005_cn=translate(data005$string, from = "en", to = "zh-CN")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
data005_cn=cbind(data005_cn,data005)
data005_cn=data005_cn %>% select(-string)
```
:::



# word cloud  1 english


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(wordcloud2) 
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
my_graph_en=wordcloud2(data=data005, size=1)
#my_graph_en
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(webshot2)
library(htmlwidgets)

saveWidget(my_graph_en,"tmp_en.html")#先保存为网页格式

webshot("tmp_en.html", "wordcloud_en.jpg", delay = 2) ##IRIENI
```

::: {.cell-output-display}

:::
:::



# word cloud  2 chinese



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(showtext)
showtext_auto()
par(family="PingFangSC-Regular")
my_graph=wordcloud2(data=data005_cn,size=1)
#my_graph
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(webshot2)
library(htmlwidgets)

saveWidget(my_graph,"tmp.html")#先保存为网页格式

webshot("tmp.html", "wordcloud.jpg", delay = 2) ##IRIENI
```

# chart 1 with gglolt

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2) 
ggplot(data005, aes(x=reorder(string,n), y=n)) +geom_text(aes(label = n), hjust = -0.1)+ ylim(min=0, 5000)+
  geom_bar(stat="identity")+coord_flip()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](8b-summary-in-R_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-17-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


# chart 2 add image gglolt



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2) 
library(png)
library(grid)
library(patchwork) 


img2 <- readPNG("en_glass.png")
img3=rasterGrob(img2, width = unit(1,"npc"), height = unit(1,"npc"))

gg=ggplot(data005, aes(x=reorder(string,n), y=n))+theme_classic()+geom_text(aes(label = n), hjust = -0.1)+ ylim(min=0, 5000)+xlab("Flavor") + ylab("Frequency")+
  geom_bar(stat="identity",fill="#CD5C5C")+coord_flip()+ggtitle("Whisky notes Top30 most used words",subtitle = "5K review")+labs(caption = "data source:www.whiskynote.be from 2010-2024")+
  inset_element(img3, 0.65, 0.15, 1, 0.75,align_to = 'full')
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
gg
```
